item.title: Projects
item.description: This is a gallery of all my projects. Click on them for more information!

item.title: About
item.description: Welcome! My name is Markus Engsner, and this is my personal website. Here I showcase things I make, as well as write about things that I happen to find interesting. I spend most of my spare time programming, as well as building various electronic gadgets and robots. Currently I’m mostly doing various programming challenges. You can find some of the solutions on my Github (linked on the left). I have experience in the programming languages C++, C and Python.
